CustomField.description: It's a difference between NCR Estimated Participation and NCR Approved.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Total_NCR_Approved__c = 0,Total_NCR_Approved__c = null), 0, Total_NCR_Estimated_Participation__c - Total_NCR_Approved__c - Released_Funds__c)
CustomField.label: Accrual Balance
